archimate:Plateau.name: OO 6: LSSTCam Phase 1 Bundle (Plateau)
archimate:Plateau.documentation: The LSSTCam Phase One bundle provides for full speed production archiving of LSSTCam data, and for prompt processing at NCSA to produce parameters to be returned to the observatory. Processing supports calibrations, and science images processing needed to provide the needed characterization of images. This charaterization stops short of difference imaging.
